page.title: 20Social Concerns
page.content: One of the most important areas of social concern in Hednesford is the rising unemployment levels. Local unemployment has now reached 25% and is well above the national average. In many families mothers are going out to work and fathers are out of work. This is affecting family life. Another major concern is the threat of nuclear war. A group called CND are trying to prevent more nuclear missiles being developed by holding demonstrations. Cruelty to children and animals continues to cause concern despite the efforts of groups like NSPCC, RSPCA and Greenpeace. At the present time, people are concerned about poverty and famine in countries like Africa, where thousands of people are starving and dying daily from mal nuitrition. Many people feel money spent on nuclear weapons would be better spent helping poorer countries.
